  • Classes in net.minecraft.network.message used by net.minecraft.client.network
    Class
    Description
    LastSeenMessagesCollector
    Collects the message that are last seen by a client.
    MessageChain.Packer
    Packers sign a message on the client with its preceding message's index.
    MessageSignatureStorage
    Collects message signatures on the server to make a message chain.
    MessageVerifier
    Verifies incoming messages' signature and the message chain.
    SignedMessage
    A signed message, consisting of the signature, the signed content, the message body, the link to its preceding message, and the optional unsigned content supplied when the message decorator modified the message.

    Description
    AcknowledgedMessage
    A message that is acknowledged.

    A record holding the signatures for all signable arguments of an executed command.
    ArgumentSignatureDataMap.ArgumentSigner
    A functional interface that signs an argument of a command.
    ArgumentSignatureDataMap.Entry
    An entry of the signatures map, consisting of the argument's name and signature data.

    LastSeenMessagesCollector.LastSeenMessages
     
    MessageBody
    A body of a message, including the content, timestamp, salt used for the digest (the hashed body), and the list of players' "last seen messages".
    MessageBody.Serialized
    The serialized version of MessageBody used in networking.
    MessageChain.MessageChainException
     
    MessageChain.Packer
    Packers sign a message on the client with its preceding message's index.

    Unpacker creates a signed message on the server with the server's preceding message index when they receive a message.
    MessageDecorator
    Message decorator decorates the chat messages and other messages server-side.
    MessageLink
    Represents a link to the preceding message that a particular message has.
    MessageSignatureData
    A message signature data that can be verified.
    MessageSignatureData.Indexed
     
    MessageSignatureStorage
    Collects message signatures on the server to make a message chain.
    MessageType
    A message type (also known as "chat type") controls how to display or narrate the chat messages sent to the clients.
    MessageType.Parameters
    A record holding the message type and the decoration parameters.
    MessageType.Serialized
    The serialized version of MessageType.Parameters that is used in packets.
    MessageVerifier
    Verifies incoming messages' signature and the message chain.
    SentMessage
    A class wrapping SignedMessage on the server to allow custom behavior for sending messages.
    SignedCommandArguments
    An interface wrapping ArgumentSignatureDataMap.
    SignedMessage
    A signed message, consisting of the signature, the signed content, the message body, the link to its preceding message, and the optional unsigned content supplied when the message decorator modified the message.
